# kAudioFileLoopDirection_ForwardAndBackward

**Global Variable**

Play the segment forward and backward.

## Declaration

```swift
var kAudioFileLoopDirection_ForwardAndBackward: UInt32 { get }
```

## Constants

- **kAudioFileLoopDirection_NoLooping**: The segment is not looped.
- **kAudioFileLoopDirection_Forward**: Play the segment forward.
- **kAudioFileLoopDirection_Backward**: Play the segment backward.
title: kAudioFileLoopDirection_ForwardAndBackward
